name: It is Too Hot to Work
name_original: It is Too Hot to Work
description:
It was too hot to work so I threw this thing together from free and paid asset store stuff (and i also modelled a hot dog guy)

there's a bug where you can see the game before the intro plays, don't worry about that it's fine

for No More Sweden 2018, my themes were "Hot dog" and "Packing Commodities"

RMB to zoom, wasd to walk, shift to sprint, space to jump.

music from incompetech.com, made using First Person Exploration Kit

should work with a controller
